mapper.select: SELECT A.ID userId, A.NAME userName, A.EMAIL userEmail, B.ID id, B.TITLE title, B.CONTENT content, B.CREATED_DATE createdDate, B.UPDATED_DATE updatedDate FROM USER A JOIN BOARD B ON A.ID = B.USER_ID

SELECT A.ID userId, A.NAME userName, A.EMAIL userEmail, B.ID id, B.TITLE title, B.CONTENT content, B.CREATED_DATE createdDate, B.UPDATED_DATE updatedDate FROM USER A JOIN BOARD B ON A.ID = B.USER_ID WHERE A.ID = #{userId}

SELECT A.ID userId, A.NAME userName, A.EMAIL userEmail, B.ID id, B.TITLE title, B.CONTENT content, B.CREATED_DATE createdDate, B.UPDATED_DATE updatedDate FROM USER A JOIN BOARD B ON A.ID = B.USER_ID WHERE B.TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')

SELECT A.ID userId, A.NAME userName, A.EMAIL userEmail, B.ID id, B.TITLE title, B.CONTENT content, B.CREATED_DATE createdDate, B.UPDATED_DATE updatedDate FROM USER A JOIN BOARD B ON A.ID = B.USER_ID WHERE B.CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{content}, '%')

SELECT A.ID userId, A.NAME userName, A.EMAIL userEmail, B.ID id, B.TITLE title, B.CONTENT content, B.CREATED_DATE createdDate, B.UPDATED_DATE updatedDate FROM USER A JOIN BOARD B ON A.ID = B.USER_ID WHERE B.ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (title, content, user_id) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{userId})
